entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone who has caught Harry up on points and is being talked about by others. He is described as having been angry since Rita Skeeter's article.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being talked about by Cedric and Amos Diggory. He is mentioned as being the only Hogwarts champion in Rita Skeeter's article.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who wrote an article about the Triwizard Tournament that made Harry out to be the only Hogwarts champion. She is described as causing trouble.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: Amos Diggory is mentioned as someone who is talking about Cedric and Harry. He is described as working at the Ministry.

entities.name: bill weasley
entities.description: Bill Weasley is mentioned as walking out of the door with Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as talking about Rita Skeeter and laying a hand on her husband's arm to calm him down.

relationships.description: Cedric caught Harry up on points, as mentioned by others in the conversation.
Amos Diggory criticized Rita Skeeter for causing trouble with her article.
Harry was mentioned to have beaten Cedric before, as said by Amos Diggory.
